title: Two men, including one wearing dark long sleeved robe with light colored scarf with cross and fringe at bottom hand extended holding onto string of package, possibly pastor, shaking hands with woman, wearing eyeglasses, dark long sleeved robe, light colored round hat with dark accent, one strand necklace, and light colored gloves, posed in front of altar of church, with two Christ paintings on wall, and large light up cross in between paintings, in background
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
